directions: Blend chile peppers, onions, cilantro, oil, garlic, coriander, lemon zest, cumin, shrimp paste, paprika, peppercorns, lemon grass, turmeric, and salt together in a blender until a smooth, paste-like consistency is reached.
ingredients: 5 dried red chile peppers, or to taste
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or more as needed
title: Thai Red Curry Paste
